name: Wade Bleecker
description: Wade Bleecker, better known asMr. Hands, is afixercovering business in the areas ofPacificainNight City. Wade Bleecker worked as a well-known high rankingcorporateatPetrochem. He was very successful in his career until a sudden shake-up in upper management, in which Bleecker was chosen to be sacrificed for the corporation. He managed to survive the assassination attempt, but after a bounty was put on his head, Wade was forced to disappear.
